name: Steam Game Data Backup File
summary: Learn about .CSD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To restore a game from a CSD backup, select Steam â†’ Backup and Restore Games... and choose the file. The CSD and corresponding .CSM files are is located in the appropriate game folder in the "Steam Backups" folder.

description: A CSD file is a backup file created by Steam, a gaming service that allows users to download and manage Valve games. It contains backup game data, similar to a .SID file, and can be used to restore a game that has been deleted.
